sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper IP Firewall
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
SELECT tblAssets.AssetID , tblSystemEnclosure.SMBIOSAssetTag AS AssetTag , tNetworkAdapter.Speed AS EstimatedBandwidth , CASE WHEN EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tblPrinters WHERE tblPrinters.ASsetID = tblAssets.AssetID) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CanPrint , 'Resource' AS Category , tAssetComments.Comment AS Comments , CAST(tblAssets.AssetID AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(TRIM(tblAssets.Mac), '') AS CorrelationID
, tblAssets.NrProcessors AS CPUCount , tmpProcessor.Manufacturer AS CpuManufacturer , tmpProcessor.CPUName AS CpuName , tmpProcessor.MaxClockSpeed AS CpuMaxClockMhz , tblAssets.Processor AS CPU_Type , tNetwork.DefaultIPGateway AS DefaultGateway
, 'firewall' AS DeviceType , 'Lansweeper' AS DiscoverySource
, tblDiskDrives.TotalGB AS DiskSpaceGB , tNetwork.DNSDomain AS DNSDomain
, tblAssetCustom.Manufacturer AS FirmwareManufacturer , tblAssetCustom.FirmwareVersion AS FirmwareVersion
, tblAssets.Firstseen AS FirstDiscovered , tblAssets.FQDN AS FQDN , 'installed' AS HardwareStatus , 'in_use' AS HardwareSubStatus , 1 AS InstallStatus , tblAssets.IPAddress AS IPAddress , tblAssets.Lastseen AS LastDiscovered , tblAssets.Mac AS MACAddress , tblAssetCustom.Manufacturer AS Manufacturer , tblAssetCustom.Model AS ModelID , tblAssetCustom.Model AS ModelNumber , tblAssets.AssetName AS [Name] , tblState.Statename AS OperationalStatus , tblAssetCustom.PurchaseDate AS Purchased , tblAssets.Memory AS RAM_MB , tblAssetCustom.Serialnumber AS SerialNumber , tblAssets.Description AS ShortDescription , tsysIPLocations.IPLocation AS SNMPLocation , 'IP' AS Subcategory , tblAssets.Domain AS Sys_Domain , tblAssetCustom.Warrantydate AS Warranty_Expiration , tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename AS SourceName FROM tblAssets LEFT OUTER JOIN tblComputersystem On tblAssets.AssetID = tblComputersystem.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tsysAssetTypes ON tblAssets.Assettype = tsysAssetTypes.assettype LEFT OUTER JOIN tblSystemEnclosure On tblAssets.AssetID = tblSystemEnclosure.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tsysOS On tblAssets.OScode = tsysOS.OScode LEFT OUTER JOIN tblOperatingsystem On tblAssets.AssetID = tblOperatingsystem.AssetID INNER JOIN tblAssetCustom On tblAssets.AssetID = tblAssetCustom.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblState on tblState.State = tblAssetCustom.State LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT tblNetwork.AssetID , tblNetwork.IPAddress , tblNetwork.Description , DefaultIPGateway , DNSDomain FROM tblNetwork WHERE tblNetwork.IPEnabled = 1 and tblNetwork.DHCPenabled = 1 /* check this */ and (tblNetwork.DefaultIPGateway IS NOT NULL OR tblNetwork.DNSDomain IS NOT NULL) ) tNetwork ON tblAssets.AssetID = tNetwork.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT tna.AssetID , MAX(tna.Name) AS Name , MAX(tna.Manufacturer) AS Manufacturer , MAX(tna.Speed) Speed FROM tblNetworkAdapter tna WHERE NetEnabled = 1 GROUP BY tna.AssetID ) tNetworkAdapter ON tNetworkAdapter.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID,MAX(NumberOfCores) as NumberOfCores , MAX(MaxClockSpeed) as MaxClockSpeed , MAX(Manufacturer) as Manufacturer , MAX(Name) as CPUName FROM tblProcessor GROUP BY AssetID ) as tmpProcessor ON tblAssets.AssetID = tmpProcessor.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tsysIPLocations On tsysIPLocations.StartIP <= tblAssets.IPNumeric AND tsysIPLocations.EndIP >= tblAssets.IPNumeric
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , SUM(Size) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 AS TotalGB FROM tblDiskdrives WHERE FileSystem IS NOT NULL AND FileSystem NOT IN ('CDFS', 'UDF') GROUP BY AssetID ) tblDiskDrives ON tblDiskDrives.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , MAX(Added) AS Added , MAX(Comment) AS Comment FROM tblAssetComments GROUP BY AssetId )tAssetComments ON tAssetComments.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID
WHERE tblAssets.Assettype IN (SELECT Assettype FROM tsysAssetTypes WHERE AssetTypeName IN ('Firewall'))
